description:
The advanced women's studies course in the department, focusing on a particularaspect of literature by and about women. Topics might include: "Victorian Literary Women"; "Women, Politics, and Literature"; "Feminist Literary Theory";and similar foci. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: AFRICAN AMERICAN CREATIVE NON-FICTION:  THE MEMOIR, THE ESSAY, AND THE BLOG
